active.name: active
active.tooltip: Set up arcane assembly lines of forgecraft and Daemon-binding to manufacture enhancements for Armoury category units.

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: The Manufactory is locked until you unlock modifications in the Armoury

newstate.name: NewState
newstate.tooltip: Stockpile standard weapons and armour forged for specific units, increasing their unit capacities.

dy_change_holder.componentleveltooltip: [[col:yellow]]You gain 1 Conclave Influence per turn per region you own.You can gain up to 5 additional Conclave Influence per turn from your Towers[[/col]]

callback_with_context.context_function_id: Helforge.UnitCategoriesList.Any((cat) => Helforge.InitiativeSetForCategory(cat).InitiativeList.Any( UpkeepCostContext && (IsLocked == false || IsOnlyOnCooldown) && HasSeen == false))

label_num_rituals_available.componentleveltooltip: Units available to increase recruitment capacity with current [[img:icon_armaments]][[/img]]Armaments supply

header.component_level_text: Are you sure you want to activate these modifications?

panel_smoke_t.comment: Opacity set to 0 so that when material cant be shown (loading screens) it doesnt leave a blank white image around!
